text:
April 30, 2018 / 10:45 AM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Aerie Pharmaceuticals Announces U.S. Launch Of Rhopressa 0.02% Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Aerie Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* AERIE PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES U.S. LAUNCH OF RHOPRESSAÂ® (NETARSUDIL OPHTHALMIC SOLUTION) 0.02%
* AERIE - FORMULARY CONTRACTS FOR COMMERCIAL INSURANCE COVERAGE IN 2018, MEDICARE PART D PROGRAM COVERAGE BEGINNING 2019 IN FINAL STAGES OF EXECUTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
